name: New Super Mario Bros. - Star Chasers
name_original: New Super Mario Bros. - Star Chasers
description:
A  1-16 player remake of NSMBDS'  Versus Mode. Play on some familiar maps like Grassland or Bricks, or the new custom ones, City and Kisaragi.

We have a Discord to keep up to date with the development of the game, make bug reports, receive support, and look for others to play with!

Use arrow keys to move, and press Z to jump and X to run. This game also has controller support via port 0 with customizable controls to come in the future.
